V.ii.4.A.6.a
.
Impact of Guidance Changes
Changes to laws, regulations, or policy or procedural guidance may impact the assignment of effective dates.Â  The outcome of an effective date determination in such situations is dependent upon the
nature of the change, and
the status of the claim.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A - Effective Dates
citation: Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A
